title: Panoptic Insights: July Newsletter
description: Panoptic receives grant from Uniswap Foundation for 'gRHO' platform, publishes security audit reports, receives grant from the Arbitrum Foundation, is heading to EthCC, and more!

title: Panoptic Awarded Grant from Uniswap Foundation for 'gRHO' Platform
description: Panoptic has been awarded a grant from the Uniswap Foundation to develop the gRHO platform for passive liquidity providers and token launchers on Uniswap v4.

title: Passive Liquidity Pools
description: Panoptic's passive liquidity pools let LPs earn yield from Uniswap V3 without active management, combining V2's simplicity with V3's efficiency.

title: Panoptic Awarded Grant from Arbitrum Foundation
description: Panoptic awarded grant from the Arbitrum Foundation for its DeFi options platform.

title: Panoptic Insights: June Newsletter
description: Panoptic's new points incentive program, Code4rena audit results, Uniswap implied volatility, bullish crypto policy, and more!
